Translations.Text: Yanca mobadala, tyancya palanakartyajavala nirantara rahanarya jannati aheta, jyancya khali (thanda panyace) pravaha vahata asatila, jyata te sadaivakala rahatila. Sarvasrestha allaha tyancyasi raji jhala, ani he tyacyasi raji jhale. He (kevala asa manasakarita ahe jo apalya palanakartyace bhaya rakhato)
Jevha jaminila purnapane tharathara halavile ja'ila
Ani ti apalyata asalele sarva ojhe bahera kadhuna phekela
Manusya mhanu lagela ki hila jhale tari kaya
Tya divasi jamina apala sarva ahavala sadara karila
Yasathi ki tumacya palanakartyane tila tasa adesa dila asela
Tya divasi loka vegavegalya jamati banuna (parata) phiratila yasathi ki tyanna tyanci karme dakhavili javita
Tevha, jyane kana'itakehi satkarma kele asela, to te pahila
Ani jyane kana'itakehi duskarma kele asela, to te pahila
Maga tapa maruna cingarya udavinaryanci sapatha
Maga sakalacya veli halla cadhavinaryanci sapatha
Nihsansaya, manusya apalya palanakartyasi motha krtaghna ahe
Ani khatrine to svatahhi yavara saksi ahe
Ani ha dhanacya mohatahi motha sakta (kathora) ahe
Kaya yala ti vela mahita nahi jevha kabarimadhye je (kahi) ahe, kadhuna ghetale ja'ila
